name: Car Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
name_original: Car Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
description:
A cute puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 0 to 6 with lovely designed cars!

Features
- 20 puzzles with three different "puzzle styles"
- lots of different cars
- puzzles for all ages
- difficulty level increases with each puzzle
- easy to learn and control

The first puzzles are FREE. The remaining can be unlocked easily via inapp-purchase!

ATTENTION
If you don't want your child to "accidentally" buy the full version, be sure to disable in-app purchases via the settings menu of your device!
